ntnu.stud.valens.demonstration.connectivity

Class DatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • ntnu.stud.valens.demonstration.connectivity.DatabaseHelper

  • public class DatabaseHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Database helper is an object that builds and maintains the database. It also works as an interface to the database.
    Author:
    Elias, Johannes

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(SQLiteDatabase db)
        Builds a table which is used to store the information. Is called automatically by the system when a DataBaseHelper object is created, but no database exists.
        Parameters:
        db - - Provided by the system

      • onUpgrade

        public void onUpgrade(SQLiteDatabase db,
             int oldVersion,
             int newVersion)
        Upgrades the database version by clearing the content and building new tables. Is called automatically by the system if one changes DATABASE_VERSION.

      • onDowngrade

        public void onDowngrade(SQLiteDatabase db,
               int oldVersion,
               int newVersion)
        Downgrade the database version and clear its content. Called automatically by the system if the DATABASE_VERSION constant is changed to a lower number.

      • dbGetEventList

        public List<Event> dbGetEventList()
        Fetches a list of (Event.ID, EventType.Description, EventType.Icon) tuples from the database.
        Returns:
        The list

      • getLocalEventTitle

        public String getLocalEventTitle(String origTitle)
        A help for localizing messages from the database. Translates abstract event title codes to strings found in the localized string.xml files.
        Parameters:
        origTitle - - The event title code found in the database.
        Returns:
        The localized event title.

      • getLocalEventDescription

        public String getLocalEventDescription(String origDesc)
        A help for localizing messages from the database. Translates abstract event description codes to strings found in the localized string.xml files.
        Parameters:
        origDesc - - The event description code found in the database.
        Returns:
        The localized event description.

      • dbAddEvent

        public void dbAddEvent(int eventType,
              int param1,
              int param2)
        Stores a new event of the appropriate type to the database.

      • dbDeleteEvent

        public boolean dbDeleteEvent(int id)
        Deletes the event with the given ID from the database.
        Returns:
        True if an event was deleted, false if no event with the given id exists or an error occurred.

      • dbGetEventInfo

        public Map<String,String> dbGetEventInfo(int id)
        Fetches information about a single event from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - - the id of the event in the database
        Returns:
        A map where the column names are keys

      • dbHaveEvents

        public boolean dbHaveEvents()
        Checks if there are any events in the database.

      • dbGetContactList

        public List<Contact> dbGetContactList()
        Gets a list of the contacts stored in the application.
        Returns:
        A list of contact objects.

      • dbGetAlarmTypes

        public List<String> dbGetAlarmTypes()
        Gets the list of alarm types that are used in the application.
        Returns:
        A list of the names of the alarm types that are used.

      • dbAddContact

        public String dbAddContact(String id)
        Add a contact to the application's local list of contacts from the phone's global contact list.
        Parameters:
        id - - the id of the contact in the phone's contact list.
        Returns:
        The contact's name if successful, None otherwise.

      • dbAddContact

        public void dbAddContact(Contact contact)
        Add a contact to the application's local list of contacts. Stores the name and phone number of the contact.
        Parameters:
        contact - - a contact object that contains the name and phone number.

      • dbGetContact

        public Contact dbGetContact(int id)
        Gets a contact from the local application database, found by id.
        Parameters:
        id - - the id of the contact
        Returns:
        a contact object containing the name, phone number and id of the contact.

      • dbUpdateContact

        public boolean dbUpdateContact(Contact contact)
        Synchronizes the information stored in the database with the contact object.
        Parameters:
        contact - - the contact object to synchronize to.
        Returns:
        a boolean that is true if the update was successfull.

      • dbClearAllData

        public void dbClearAllData()
        Clear all data from the database.

      • dbDeleteContact

        public void dbDeleteContact(Contact contact)
        Deletes contact from the database, using the id stored in the contact object.
        Parameters:
        contact - - the object representing the contact that should be deleted.

      • reset

        public void reset(SQLiteDatabase db)
        Resets the database - clears all the tables, and creates tables according to the current specifiactions.
        Parameters:
        db - - The database object to clear.
